{{Outdated feature|The ''Bedrock Edition'' Creative inventory was overhauled completely in [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.0]] in [[Bedrock Edition beta 1.2.0.2|beta 1.2.0.2]]. The ''Java Edition'' Creative inventory received major modifications after [[The Flattening]] in [[Java Edition 17w47a|17w47a]] and was overhauled completely in [[Java Edition 1.19.3|1.19.3]] in [[Java Edition 22w42a|22w42a]].}}<!-- 

FOR APRIL FOOLS LAYOUTS, SEE THE Creative inventory/April Fools layouts ARTICLE-->

This page documents the historical layouts of the [[Creative inventory]] in ''Java Edition'' prior to [[Java Edition 1.19.3]], and pre-[[Java Edition 1.13/Flattening|The Flattening]] in [[Java Edition 17w47a|17w47a]]; as well as in ''Bedrock Edition'' prior to the introduction of the [[recipe book]] in [[Bedrock Edition beta 1.2.0.2]]. In the case of ''Bedrock Edition'', the introduction of the recipe book in the [[Better Together Update]] is the only significant major overhaul to the layout of the Creative inventory since the introduction of the tabbed categories on that edition, even to this current day.

== Java Edition Creative inventory before 1.19.3 ==
In [[Java Edition 22w42a|22w42a]], the Creative inventory was overhauled completely on ''Java Edition'' with completely new tabs, and all blocks and items were shuffled around within, replacing the old Creative inventory layout from [[Java Edition 1.19.2|1.19.2]]. These changes were implemented in [[Java Edition 1.19.3|1.19.3]].

Below is the Creative inventory in Java Edition in 1.19.2, immediately prior to the Creative inventory overhaul:

== Java Edition Creative inventory before 1.13 ==
Prior to [[Java Edition 1.13/Flattening|The Flattening]], the order of blocks and items in the Creative inventory on ''Java Edition'' was fixed directly based on numerical block and item IDs. This meant that the layout and order of items in the Creative inventory remained fixed since the introduction of the tabbed categories for blocks and items in Creative in [[Java Edition 1.3.1|1.3.1]] in [[Java Edition 12w21b|12w21b]]. After The Flattening in [[Java Edition 17w47a|17w47a]], the layout of blocks and items could be shuffled around, meaning the arrangement of items in the Creative inventory could be, and was changed, after 17w47a.

Below is the Creative inventory in Java Edition 1.12.2:

== Pocket Edition Creative inventory before Better Together==
The introduction of the [[Better Together Update]]'s ''Bedrock Edition'', and the addition of the [[recipe book]] in [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.0]], was the only major significant overhaul to the Creative inventory on ''Bedrock Edition''. From the introduction of the tabbed categories for blocks and items in [[Pocket Edition Alpha 0.8.0]], the layout of the Creative inventory remained identical up until [[Pocket Edition 1.1.5]] and [[Pocket Edition 1.1.7]], with only a few changes and no major sweeping changes up until that point. This remains the only major overhaul to the Creative inventory on ''Bedrock Edition'' even to this day.

== Legacy Console Edition ==
The [[Legacy Console Edition]] has never had any major sweeping changes to its Creative inventory. All historical changes to the Creative inventory on Legacy Console can be, and are<!---likely---> described in full, at [[Creative inventory/History#Legacy Console Edition]]. As the whole edition of the game was discontinued in late 2019, the Creative inventory for this edition is found at [[Legacy Console Edition exclusive features#Creative inventory]].

== New Nintendo 3DS Edition ==
The tabs of the Creative inventory on the [[New Nintendo 3DS Edition]] had remained identical since its intital release. As the New Nintendo 3DS Edition of the game was discontinued in 2019, the Creative inventory for this edition can be found at [[New Nintendo 3DS Edition exclusive features#Creative inventory]].
